headline: Sysco Corporation (SYY) Secures $3B Credit Facility, Boosting Liquidity Through 2030
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 13 Best Bear Market Stocks to Buy Right Now. Sysco Corporation is one of them. Sysco Corporation (NYSE:SYY), a leading global foodservice distributor, serves restaurants, healthcare, education, and hospitality sectors across the U.S. and internationally. The company leverages a diversified product portfolio and strategic acquisitions to expand its […]
